    • Constructor Detail

      • Hero

        public Hero(double x,
            double y,
            java.lang.String n)
        Creates a new Hero based on the String passed in
        Parameters:
        x - The x position this object will be created at
        y - The y position this object will be created at
        n - The name of this object. This determines what type of Hero is created

    • Method Detail

      • takeDamage

        public void takeDamage(double amount)
        Subtracts the parameter amount from the Hero health. SHOULD NOT BE USED IF AMOUNT IS ENOUGH TO KILL THIS HERO
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of health this Hero loses

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(double x,
                        double y)
        Acts like moving the Hero, but it sort of jumps to the indicated x and y coords
        Parameters:
        x - The x coordinate the Hero is moved to
        y - The y coordinate the Hero is moved to
